metadata.name: Sovaldi 400 mg film coated tablets
metadata.composition: Sovaldi 400 mg film coated tablets Each film coated tablet contains 400 mg of sofosbuvir For the full list of

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Sovaldi is indicated in combination with other medicinal products for the treatment of chronic hepatitis C CHC in adults and paediatric patients aged 3 years and above see sections 4 2 4 4 and 5 1 For hepatitis C virus HCV genotype specific activity see sections 4 4 and 5 1

contraindications.disease: Hypersensitivity to the active substance or to any of the excipients listed in section 6 1 Medicinal products that are strong P glycoprotein P gp inducers in the intestine carbamazepine phenobarbital phenytoin rifampicin and St John s wort Co administration will significantly decrease sofosbuvir plasma concentration and could result in loss of efficacy of Sovaldi see section 4 5
contraindications.excipients: Mannitol (E421);Microcrystalline cellulose;Croscarmellose sodium;Colloidal anhydrous silica;Magnesium stearate;Polyvinyl alcohol;Titanium dioxide;Macrogol;Talc;Iron oxide yellow
